actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services, through the Health Care Financing Administration, to expand and strengthen the demonstration project known as the Medicare telemedicine demonstration program.

summary.text: Rural Telemedicine Demonstration Act of 1997 - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to: (1) expand the Medicare telemedicine demonstration project program to include the Alaska Telemedicine Project and the Montana Healthcare Telecommunications Alliance; and (2) report annually to the Congress on the project's effectiveness, along with any appropriate legislative recommendations. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services, through the Health Care Financing Administration, to expand and strengthen the demonstration project known as the Medicare telemedicine demonstration program.
